title: SMASHED EGG SANDWICH
directions: Soft-boil 4 eggs using your fav recipe.
Toast brioche buns lightly and spread butter if desired.
Put 2 eggs between buns and sprinkle chicken salt, onions, and chilies.
Use your hand to gently push eggs to smash until yolks run out. Alternatively, slice eggs in the middle to allow yolks to pour out.

In a bowl, combine 6 tbsp table salt, 3 tsp chicken bouillon, 3 tsp garlic powder, 3 tsp sweet paprika, 1 tsp white pepper, 1 tsp celery seed. Combine the ingredients well and store it in an airtight container.
